card.name: "Freyalise, Skyshroud Partisan"
card.text: +1: Choose up to one target Elf. Untap it. It and a random Elf creature card in your hand each perpetually gets +1/+1.−1: Seek an Elf card.−6: Conjure a Regal Force card onto the battlefield.

card.name: "Kiora, Wrath of the Tides"
card.text: +1: Conjure a Kraken Hatchling into your hand.+1: Untap target creature or land. Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that permanent.−3: You may sacrifice a Kraken. If you do, create a 8/8 blue Kraken creature token.

card.name: "Reckless Ringleader"
card.text: HasteWhen "Reckless Ringleader" enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains haste.

card.name: "Skyshroud Lookout"
card.text: ReachWhen "Skyshroud Lookout" enters the battlefield, seek an Elf card.

card.name: Archfiend of Sorrows
card.text: FlyingWhen Archfiend of Sorrows enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.Unearth {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Baffling Defenses
card.text: Target creature's base power perpetually becomes 0.

card.name: Blade Splicer
card.text: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.Golems you control have first strike.

card.name: Boneyard Aberration
card.text: When Boneyard Aberration dies, exile it. If you do, conjure three Reassembling Skeleton cards into your graveyard.

card.name: Bounty of the Deep
card.text: If you have no land cards in your hand, seek a land card and a nonland card. Otherwise, seek two nonland cards.

card.name: Davriel's Withering
card.text: Target creature perpetually gets -1/-2.

card.name: Davriel, Soul Broker
card.text: +1: Until your next turn, whenever an opponent attacks you and/or planeswalkers you control, they discard a card. If they can't, they sacrifice an attacking creature.−2: Accept one of Davriel's offers, then accept one of Davriel's conditions.−3: Target creature perpetually gets -3/-3.

card.name: Ethereal Grasp
card.text: Tap target creature. That creature perpetually gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step" and "{8}: Untap this creature."

card.name: Faceless Agent
card.text: ChangelingWhen Faceless Agent enters the battlefield, seek a creature card of the most prevalent creature type in your library.

card.name: First-Sphere Gargantua
card.text: When First-Sphere Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Hardened Scales
card.text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

card.name: Leonin Sanctifier
card.text: LifelinkWhen Leonin Sanctifier enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains lifelink.

card.name: Longtusk Staker
card.text: Whenever Longtusk Staker enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E}.Pay {E}{E}: Longtusk Staker perpetually gets +1/+0. You may choose a creature card in your hand. If you do, that card perpetually gets +1/+0.

card.name: Lumbering Lightshield
card.text: When Lumbering Lightshield enters the battelfield, target opponent reveals a nonland card at random from their hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} more to cast."

card.name: Managorger Phoenix
card.text: FlyingManagorger Phoenix can't block.Whenever you cast a spell, if Managorger Phoenix is in your graveyard, put a flame counter on Managorger Phoenix for each {R} in that spell's mana cost. If Managorger Phoenix has five or more flame counters on it, return it to the battlefield and it perpetually gets +1/+1.

card.name: Manor Guardian
card.text: When Manor Guardian dies, each player seeks a nonland card with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Mentor of Evos Isle
card.text: FlyingWhen Mentor of Evos Isle enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains flying.

card.name: Plaguecrafter's Familiar
card.text: DeathtouchWhen Plaguecrafter's Familiar enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains deathtouch.

card.name: Ponder
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.Draw a card.

card.name: Pool of Vigorous Growth
card.text: {X}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of a random creature card with mana value X. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Ranger-Captain of Eos
card.text: When Ranger-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 1 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.Sacrifice Ranger-Captain of Eos: Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

card.name: Return to the Ranks
card.text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)Return X target creature cards with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Sarkhan's Scorn
card.text: Sarkhan's Scorn deals damage equal to the number of turns you have begun to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Sarkhan, Wanderer to Shiv
card.text: +1: Dragon cards in your hand perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast," and "You may pay {X} rather than pay this spell's mana cost, where X is its mana value."0: Conjure a Shivan Dragon card into your hand.−2: Sarkhan, Wanderer to Shiv deals 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Scion of Shiv
card.text: Flying{2}{R}: Scion of Shiv perpetually gets +1/+0.

card.name: Seasoned Pyromancer
card.text: When Seasoned Pyromancer enters the battlefield, discard two cards, then draw two cards. For each nonland card discarded this way, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.{3}{R}{R}, Exile Seasoned Pyromancer from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens.

card.name: Shoreline Scout
card.text: When Shoreline Scout enters the battlefield, you may exile a Merfolk card or a land card from your hand. If you do, conjure a Tropical Island card into your hand.As long as another Merfolk or an Island entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Shoreline Scout gets +1/+0.

card.name: Skyshroud Ambush
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. When the creature you control wins the fight, draw a card.

card.name: Static Discharge
card.text: Static Discharge deals X damage to any target, where X is 3 plus the number of charge counters on Static Discharge. Then put a perpetual charge counter on this card and each card named Static Discharge in your hand, library, and graveyard.

card.name: Stormfront Pegasus
card.text: Flying

card.name: Subversive Acolyte
card.text: {2}, Pay 2 life: Choose one. Activate only once.• Subversive Acolyte becomes a Human Cleric. It gets +1/+2 and gains lifelink.• Subversive Acolyte becomes a Phyrexian. It gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents."

card.name: Teyo, Aegis Adept
card.text: +1: Up to one target creature's base power perpetually becomes equal to its toughness. It perpetually gains "This creature can attack as though it didn't have defender."−2: Conjure a Lumbering Lightshield card onto the battlefield.−6: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, return target white creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You gain life equal to its toughness."

card.name: Thalia's Lieutenant
card.text: When Thalia's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Human you control.Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Thalia's Lieutenant.

card.name: Tome of the Infinite
card.text: {U}, {T}: Conjure a random card from Tome of the Infinite's spellbook into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

card.name: Tropical Island
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)

card.name: Veteran Charger
card.text: When Veteran Charger enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +2/+2.

card.name: Wingsteed Trainer
card.text: When Wingsteed Trainer enters the battlefield or attacks, conjure a Stormfront Pegasus card into your hand.

card.name: Yawgmoth, Thran Physician
card.text: Protection from HumansPay 1 life, Sacrifice another creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature and draw a card.{B}{B}, Discard a card: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
